ygData.msgSnippet: ... she watched him leave.  She sighed and went back inside the ship. She wanted to still enjoy life and enjoy those in her life.  But enjoyment was becomming

::Battera:;

she watched him leave.  She sighed and went back inside the ship.  
She wanted to still enjoy life and enjoy those in her life.  But 
enjoyment was becomming shorter and great time between the good 
times.  She walked slowly down the hall with ehr wings wrapped around 
her body, looking down.  She missed having bots to talk to and enjoy 
time with.  But she was finally coming to the realization, that as 
long as the war went on, life and all that was good in it, was out of 
her reach. She had one objective now, function and get her mission 
acomplished.  She walked back to her quarters.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow <twb176@y...> wrote:
> ::WindRider::
> He looked down at Battera and smiled. "OK suit
> yourself", he said to her. "But if you change your
> mind, just come and find me." With that, he began to
> climb as high as his wings and the current would take him.
>
